message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Considering its unparalleled features and craftsmanship, we believe it is worth more than its face value. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to make it yours, you can acquire it for $12000. This special price reflects our commitment to making such high-quality items accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
